title: RLDA Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Manager and Assistant Manager Posts
description: Rail Land Development Authority (RLDA) has declared the latest job notification for 2025 and allotted 02 vacancies for Manager and Assistant Manager Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech. in Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the RLDA Recruitment 2025 . Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply on or ...
